title: Software Engineer
description:
Key Responsibilities:
Develop high-quality software design and architecture.

Write clean, scalable, and efficient code in languages such as Java, Python, JavaScript, C++, or others.

Collaborate with cross-functional teams to define, design, and ship new features.

Participate in code reviews and provide constructive feedback to peers.

Identify, troubleshoot, and debug software defects.

Stay current with emerging technologies and best practices in software development.

Contribute to all phases of the software development lifecycle (SDLC).

Maintain documentation for software functionality and development processes.

Requirements:
Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or related field (or equivalent experience).

Proficiency in one or more programming languages.

Familiarity with version control systems (e.g., Git).

Experience with databases, APIs, and cloud services is a plus.

Strong problem-solving and communication skills.

Ability to work independently and as part of a team.

Preferred Skills (Optional):
Experience with Agile or Scrum methodologies.

Knowledge of DevOps practices and CI/CD pipelines.

Familiarity with front-end frameworks (React, Angular) or back-end frameworks (Node.js, Django).

Understanding of security best practices.
